A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class DalekBoard
This method is called when a menu item is selected the appropriate actions are taken depending on which menu item was selected
addBoardListener(BoardListener) - Method in class Board
Adds a BoardListener to this board
addBoardListener(DalekGame) - Method in class DalekBoard
Adds a DalekGame to this dalek board We override Board's addBoardListener to add a DalekGame instead This makes it much easier for CatchGame and DalekBoard to communicate with eachother
advanceTowards(Doctor) - Method in class Dalek
Attempts to move the Dalek towards the Doctor by the most direct route, moving up, down, right, left or diagonally.

Board - Class in <Unnamed>
This class models a Board used in a board game
Board(int, int) - Constructor for class Board
Initialize the instance variables and prepares the frame to be drawn on
board - Variable in class Board
 
boardListener - Variable in class Board
 
BoardListener - Interface in <Unnamed>
This interface defines a listener for receiving board clicks, which are mouse clicks on a square in your implementation of the Board class.
BoardPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is the Panel on which the Board is drawn
BoardPanel(int, int) - Constructor for class BoardPanel
The constructor sets the variables and prepares the BoardPanel that the Board is to be drawn on

K

This method is called from DalekBoard and is used when the user declares that they will make no more moves for the turn
keepWaiting() - Method in interface DalekGame
Declare that the doctor will make no more moves on this level, the rest of the level will proceed as the user continually waits

message - Variable in class BoardPanel
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class Board
This method is called when the user clicks on the frame Translates the click location into a coordinate of a square on the board and calls the squareClicked method of this board's BoardListener with that coordinate
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class DalekBoard
This method is called when the user clicks on the board this method is needed to override Board's because there is a constant offset of the GUI Menu Bar that must be compensated for when listening for mouse clicks
